General.Name: Shougang Concord Century Holdings Limited
General.Description: Shougang Century Holdings Limited, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacture and sale of steel cords for use in radial tyres in the People's Republic of China. The company also manufactures and sells sawing and hose wires under the Eastern brand. In addition, it invests in properties and provides management services. The company also exports its products to Europe, the Middle East, Africa, North America, South America, and rest of Asia. The company was formerly known as Shougang Concord Century Holdings Limited and changed its name to Shougang Century Holdings Limited in December 2021. Shougang Century Holdings Limited was incorporated in 1991 and is based in Chai Wan, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Honour Industrial Centre, Chai Wan, Hong Kong
